knimeNode.name: GATKSelectVariants
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a SNP and Indel subset of a given VCF file.

fullDescription.intro: Creates a SNP or Indel subset of a given VCF file using the GATK SelectVariants walker.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Set threshold for repeated execution. Only used if HTE is enabled in the preference page.
Set path GenomeAnalysisTK.jar and memory usage.
Coverage analysis can be restricted to genomic regions defined in a BED file.

tab.name: SelectVariants
tab.option: Select column of input table in which path to input VCF file is specified.
Variant type in the resulting subset file.

ports.inPort: Cell [1..x]: Path to VCF infile. Exact column can be selected by using the node parameters.
ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to subset VCF file containing SNPs or Indels.
